sentences.en: He had retained a keen interest in the progress of the work.
sentences.cn: 他对那项工作的进展一直很关心。

sentences.en: He thumbed through a couple of pages, feigning just a slight interest.
sentences.cn: 他随手翻了几页，假装兴趣不大。

sentences.en: Here’s an article which might interest you.
sentences.cn: 这里有一篇文章，也许你会感兴趣。

sentences.en: His parents tried to discourage his interest in music, but he persisted.
sentences.cn: 他的父母设法打消他对音乐的兴趣，但他始终坚持。

sentences.en: Hopes of an early cut in interest rates bolstered confidence.
sentences.cn: 利率有望早日下调，从而增强了人们的信心。

sentences.en: I read your article with great interest.
sentences.cn: 我兴致勃勃地拜读了您的文章。

sentences.en: I watched the first few episodes, but soon lost interest.
sentences.cn: 我看了前几集，但很快就失去了兴趣。

sentences.en: If raging inflation returns, then interest rates will shoot up.
sentences.cn: 如果再发生严重的通货膨胀，那么利率就会迅速上调。

sentences.en: in the interests of security we are keeping the information confidential.
sentences.cn: 为安全起见我们对此信息保密。

sentences.en: Interest is paid monthly. Three months' notice is required for withdrawals.
sentences.cn: 利息按月支付。提款须提前3个月通知银行。

sentences.en: Interest rates would come down as the recovery gathered pace.
sentences.cn: 随着复苏的加速，利率会降下来。

sentences.en: It may interest you to know that a number of scholarships are available.
sentences.cn: 你也许有兴趣知道将提供多项奖学金。

sentences.en: loans that must be paid back with interest.
sentences.cn: 须付利息的贷款。

sentences.en: Loans were extended to help pay the interest on the old ones.
sentences.cn: 这些贷款延期偿还以支付旧账利息。

sentences.en: much of it is of interest to historians.
sentences.cn: 这其中有很多对于历史学家来说是很有趣的。

sentences.en: My department had a healthy interest in keeping expenses down.
sentences.cn: 我部门对维持低水平开支有浓厚兴趣。

sentences.en: News of interest cuts came in the nick of time for borrowers.
sentences.cn: 对借款人来说，减息的消息来得正是时候。

sentences.en: Our survey reveals a disturbing lack of interest in teacher training.
sentences.cn: 我们的调查显示人们对教师培训失去了兴趣，这很令人不安。

sentences.en: The economy needs an immediate 2 per cent cut in interest rates.
sentences.cn: 当前经济状况需要立即将利率下调两个百分点.

sentences.en: The last round of bidding aroused considerable interest.
sentences.cn: 最后一轮竞价引起人们相当大的兴趣。

sentences.en: The money was repaid with interest.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱是带息偿还的。

sentences.en: The scheme offers seed corn finance with loans at only 4% interest.
sentences.cn: 该方案提供种子基金融资，其贷款只收取4%的利息。

sentences.en: There have been grouses about the economy, interest rates and house prices.
sentences.cn: 人们对经济、利率和房价啧有烦言。

sentences.en: There's a sufficiency of drama in these lives to sustain your interest.
sentences.cn: 这些人的生活充满了戏剧性，总能让你兴趣盎然。

sentences.en: thinking in the interest of the whole family; ate breakfast on the train in the interest of time.
sentences.cn: 为了整个家着想；为了节省时间而在火车上吃早餐

sentences.en: to promote/protect/safeguard sb's interests
sentences.cn: 为某人的利益游说；保护 / 维护某人的利益

sentences.en: We have the interest of 500,000 customers to think of.
sentences.cn: 我们得为50万名顾客的利益着想。

sentences.en: What interests me is all the history of these places.
sentences.cn: 使我感兴趣的是这些地方的历史。

words.tran_cn: 感兴趣的；有权益的；有成见的
有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的

phrases.tran_cn: 借钱）在支付利息的情况下，在支付利息的条件下
利益冲突；公职人员对公众义务与其本身利益相冲突
（在所从事之事被讨论前）公开（在此事中的）经济利益
一般利益；一般娱乐；大众兴趣

phrases.phrase: in the interest of 或 in the interests of
phrases.tran_cn: 为了…的利益；为了…的缘故

phrases.phrase: in the interests (或 interest) of something

phrases.tran_cn: 个人利益；个人兴趣爱好

trans.tran_cn: 兴趣，吸引力，爱好，利息，利益，利益相关者，股权，利害关系，
trans.tran_en: if you have an interest in something or someone, you want to know or learn more about them
to make someone want to pay attention to something and find out more about it
to make someone want to pay attention to something and find out more about it
